tool_description: The API is designed to allow devices to securely authenticate with a server by scanning a QR code and JWT.
name: QR code JWT Authentication
title: QR code JWT Authentication

api_list.name: Refresh JWT token
api_list.description: This endpoint will regenerate a fresh JWT authentication token key for the deivice after a certain period for security reasons.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://qr-code-jwt-authentication.p.rapidapi.com/api/refresh-token"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "qr-code-jwt-authentication.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Scan QR code to generate API key
api_list.description: This endpoint is used to scan a QR code and generate an API key.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://qr-code-jwt-authentication.p.rapidapi.com/api/scan-qr"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "qr-code-jwt-authentication.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Device registration details
api_list.description: This endpoint is used to self-register a new device with the server.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://qr-code-jwt-authentication.p.rapidapi.com/api/register-device"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "qr-code-jwt-authentication.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
